short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: extension for managing web browsing time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
this chrome extension helps user to block specific sites based on tasks.

once the extension is installed, the default new tab page gets changed. click 'open settings' button to add a new website and task.

# how to use
1. add website url detection(regex)
2. add task, allocate enabled/disabled website
3. choose a task before browsing. If there's no task chosen, all website access is blocked
